sense.name: be present
sense.examples: He has attended most of his evening classes. I'm sorry we won't be able to attend your party.

sense.name: take charge of
sense.examples: I will attend to that stack of bills this afternoon. She attended her invalid grandmother for years. He said he would attend to that himself. The groom attended the horses while we were away.

sense.name: accompany
sense.examples: The flash of lightening was attended by a loud crashing boom. The handsome young officer is attending the debutante to the ball.

sense.name: pay attention, give heed
sense.examples: He really attends to detail in his work. The children were not attending to their substitute teacher's requests.
